Player History
Drafted in 7th round, 206th overall pick, by Milwaukee in 2006...
Traded from Milwaukee to Chicago (N) on 7/31/2009 (Going to MIL: P J. Papelbon. Going to CHN: 2B B. Lawrie, SS F. Demery, LF T. Buck)...
Injured on 5/25/2010 with a Spasms Back, out for 3-4 weeks...
Had first career hit (double) on 9/14/2011, off Jeff Gray (SF)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/20/2011, off Brett Cecil (PIT)...
Injured on 9/5/2013 with a Sore Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Milwaukee on 2/14/2017 to a 4-year deal worth $939,002 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 2/16/2021 to a 2-year deal worth $2,200,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/12/2021, hitting .700 with 0 HR, 2 RBI...
